#include<iostream>
#include<stdio.h>
using namespace std;
typedef long long ll;
ll gcd(ll x,ll y) //function definition
{
if (y!=0)
return gcd(y,x%y);
else
return x;
}
int main()
{
    ll t,n,m,g,num,den;
    scanf("%lld",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        scanf("%lld %lld",&n,&m);

        num=(((n+1)/2)*(m/2))+(((m+1)/2)*(n/2));
        den=n*m;
        g=gcd(num,den);
        printf("%lld/%lld\n",num/g,den/g);
    }
    return 0;
}
